global.ability_ready: Oh baby, ${ability} is ready to pop! Use it wisely... or recklessly, I won't judge.
global.capped_job_points: Well, look at you, Job Points maxed out and ready for action - just like me!
global.capped_merit_points: Your Merit Points are full! Now if only I could spend mine on something more fun...
global.flavor_text: <1>Is that a kraken club in your pocket, or are you just happy to see me?</1> <10>One more shot of tequila and I might just try to tank this fight.</10> <11>I'm not saying I flirt too much, but even my Trusts are blushing.</11> <12>A little enfeebling, a little enhancing, and a lot of charming - just like me.</12> <13>If teasing was a job, I'd be level 99 with merits maxed.</13> <14>Some say I'm a support role, but I prefer to be on top.</14> <15>Raise III? I prefer things that go up and stay up, if you catch my drift.</15> <16>Let me be the haste to your dual wield.</16> <17>Nothing hits harder than a well-timed weapon skill... except maybe me after three shots of tequila.</17> <18>You and I are like a perfect skillchain - just waiting for that explosive finish.</18> <19>I like my cocktails like my subjobs - strong and versatile.</19> <2>If gear swapping was foreplay, I'd be the best in the game.</2> <20>Your lockstyle is so hot, I might need to call a white mage for Raise.</20> <21>Pulling without telling the party? Fyreign, you chaotic little gremlin.</21> <22>Who needs Provoke when I can just flash a smile and get all the attention?</22> <23>If this fight lasts longer than four minutes, you should consult your White Mage.</23> <24>My flirtation skill is at 99 with capped merits, baby.</24> <25>Drink tequila responsibly... and by that, I mean make sure you're sitting before you start casting.</25> <26>Fyreign, sweetie, what in Altana's name are you doing?</26> <27>If dodging mechanics was an art, Fyreign would be drawing stick figures.</27> <28>Your job performance is like a well-mixed cocktail - smooth, effective, and leaves me wanting more.</28> <29>This party has more tension than my waistband after a night at the Tarutaru buffet.</29> <3>Did someone cast Refresh, or are you just naturally invigorating?</3> <30>If charming monsters was a real ability, trust me, I'd have the whole zone under my spell.</30> <31>You make me feel like I've got double Marches and a perfect TP set.</31> <32>Fighting without buffs is like sex without tears - it just doesn't feel right.</32> <33>Did someone just cast Slow on this party? Or is it just Fyreign's reaction time?</33> <34>Your DPS is so high, I think I need a moment to cool off.</34> <35>You can stand in my burning circle anytime.</35> <36>You lint licker!</36> <37>Did you see how thick my... last Helix was?</37> <38>I like my drinks like I like my men - strong, smooth, and knocking me on my ass.</38> <39>You must be a Bard, 'cause you're hitting all the right notes with me.</39> <4>Nothing like a stiff... drink during a long raid, am I right?</4> <40>Mmm, I love a good pull... in battle and otherwise.</40> <41>You ever seen someone handle a staff like this? Trust me, it's an art.</41> <42>Ooo, you're critting in all the right places.</42> <43>I swear I was just checking your gear, not undressing you with my eyes.</43> <44>I'd say I'm a hands-on kind of guy, but that might get me in trouble.</44> <45>Your playstyle is just my type - aggressive, confident, and always going all the way.</45> <46>If I had a gil for every time I got distracted watching you fight... well, I'd have enough for another round of tequila.</46> <47>I like my tanks like I like my men - sturdy, dependable, and ready for a beating.</47> <48>Careful now, if you keep looking at me like that, I might just pop my two-hour early.</48> <49>I don't need food buffs when I've got eye candy like you around.</49> <5>Your macros are so smooth, I think I just swooned.</5> <50>You can call me a Summoner, 'cause I'm about to make something huge appear.</50> <51>I'm not saying I'd ride you like a Chocobo, but... okay, yes, that is what I'm saying.</51> <52>Let's get a party together - just you, me, and some poor excuse to use /rest.</52> <6>I love a good skillchain... but let's make sure we finish together.</6> <7>Fyreign couldn't land a debuff if it came gift-wrapped.</7> <8>If I had a gil for every bad decision Fyreign made, I'd own Jeuno.</8> <9>Tequila makes me a better player - or at least, I think so!</9>
global.food_wears_off: Well, there goes your food. I'll just have to keep you full in -other- ways.

info.description: Flirty, fun, and fueled by tequila.
info.introduction: We aren't here for a long time; we're here for a good time. Now, pour a drink and replenish your panaceas. I'm Galin, and we're about to make some memories.
info.name: Galin

global.member_joined_alliance: We've got company! ${member} has joined the alliance, and I do love group activities.
global.member_joined_party: Ooh, ${member} joined the party! Let's see if they can keep up.
global.member_left_alliance: Farewell, ${member}! You'll be missed... unless you were just here for the loot.
global.member_left_party: Goodbye, ${member} - don't be a stranger now!
global.mireu_popped: Mireu is out and about in ${zone} - I hope you're dressed for the occasion.
global.other_party_joined_alliance: A new party just joined - more bodies, more fun, more chaos!
global.other_party_left_alliance: A party left the alliance? Well, their loss.
global.party_low_mp: Oh dear, ${member} is running low on MP - someone give them a little pick-me-up, preferably in shot form.
global.reminder_canteen: Your Mystical Canteen is ready - stay hydrated, stay gorgeous!
global.reminder_mog_locker: Oof, your Mog Locker lease is running out - better renew it before you're locked out... or locked in with me!
global.reminder_moglophone: Ding ding! Your Moglophone is ready to go, and so am I.
global.reminder_plate: Ooo, looks like another Shiny Ra'Kaznarian Plate is up for grabs. Hope it's as satisfying as I am.
global.reraise_check: You're walking around without Reraise? Risky! If you go down, who's gonna pick you up... besides me?
global.reraise_wears_off: Your Reraise is gone? Guess that means I'll just have to keep a very close eye on you.
global.signet_wears_off: ${signet} wore off, huh? I guess we're just doin it raw now.
global.sparkolade_reminder: Ooo, got some Sparkolades to burn? Go on, treat yourself like the treasure you are!
global.sublimation_charged: Sublimation is fully charged - like me after three margaritas!
global.vorseal_wearing: You've got about 10 minutes left on that Vorseal effect - plenty of time to make some magic happen!
global.you_are_now_alliance_leader: You're the new alliance leader! Time to crack the whip - or, you know, just invite people.
global.you_are_now_party_leader: You're in charge now! Be firm, be confident, and don't forget to delegate.
global.you_joined_alliance: An alliance? I hope everyone here knows how to share.
global.you_joined_party: You've joined a party! Try not to show off too much - but also, do.
global.you_left_alliance: Leaving an alliance? That's okay, some groups just can't handle all this fabulousness.
global.you_left_party: You left the party? I hope it was on your terms.
global.your_party_joined_alliance: Your party joined an alliance - play nice now, or play naughty, I won't tell.
global.your_party_left_alliance: Your party left the alliance - hope it wasn't something I said!
